name: KnowAfrika
description:
A simple african inspired game, fun to play and you get to learn cool facts about some countries in Africa.

Questions for a particular country animates down the screen while possible boxes of answers with the country name and flag flows down. Click on the correct box before it hits the ground and you increase your score.

Inspired by colors of Africa cause it embeeds various African colors animating throughout gameplay to display how beautiful the African continent is.
